thread.title: Chelsea news: Antonio Conte reveals amazing welcome from fans | Metro News
thread.title_full: Chelsea news: Antonio Conte reveals amazing welcome from fans | Metro News

author: Mark Brus For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Chelsea news: Antonio Conte reveals amazing welcome from fans | Metro News
text:
Mark Brus for Metro.co.uk Thursday 23 Feb 2017 5:43 pm Antonio Conte is loving life at Chelsea (Picture: Getty) 
Chelsea manager Antonio Conte has revealed the incredible welcome he got from the club’s fans when he took charge of his first game for the Blues back in August. Wayne Rooney releases statement over his Manchester United future 
The Italian tactician has been a revelation for Chelsea since taking over at Stamford Bridge in the summer, and admits he immediately got a good feeling from the supporters. 
Conte’s first game in charge of the west Londoners was an opening day Premier League win over West Ham, and he says the fans brought Italian flags to the stadium to welcome him to the club. Conte has taken Chelsea to the top of the table (Picture: Getty) Conte's Chelsea record in full Won
